Package dev.restate.sdk.endpoint.definition

Class HandlerDefinition<REQ,RES>

java.lang.Object
dev.restate.sdk.endpoint.definition.HandlerDefinition<REQ,RES>
public final class HandlerDefinition<REQ,RES> extends Object
This class represents a Restate handler.

      public @Nullable String getAcceptContentType()
      Returns:

    • getIngressPrivate

      public @Nullable Boolean getIngressPrivate()
      Returns:
      true if this handler cannot be invoked from the restate-server HTTP and Kafka ingress, but only from other services.
      See Also:
      • HandlerDefinition.Configurator.ingressPrivate(Boolean)

    • getEnableLazyState

      public @Nullable Boolean getEnableLazyState()
